title: Multi-dimensional poverty in India falls by 25 crore in 9 years: Niti Aayog
selftext:
Since CEO of NITI Aayog is now very trust worthy for all the members of I.N.D.I.A alliance, they should now concede this report also about India being able to lift 25 crore Indians out of multi dimensional poverty in the last decade. 

This is no small feat and I believe as a country we are on the right track. India of 2024 is on path to go on a growth juggernaut like what China did. If we have a strong government, we will have double digit growth. If we have a weak (kitchdi) government, then it might be single digit growth. 2024 elections for me is about the pace at which our country can grow.
comments: And this has been the historical trend. Check out the numbers from 2005 onwards and the number is approximately 25 crore.
